CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Strong and broad photo - to - current responses were observed in the range from 330 to 780 nm in all of these PSCs , in which the absorption above 650 nm was attributed to the polymer aggregationinduced absorption broadening.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as "Material Name":

1. PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells)
2. Polymer

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* PSCs
* Polymer
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies for the mistake. Here are the corrected "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Polymer

So, the only "Material Name" entity in the paragraph is:

* Polymer

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid "Material Name" entity in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer |

I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Strong and broad photo - to - current responses were observed in the range from 330 to 780 nm in all of these PSCs , in which the absorption above 650 nm was attributed to the polymer aggregationinduced absorption broadening.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the entities in the paragraph that correspond to the "Property Name" category:

1. "absorption"
2. "absorption broadening"

These are the names of properties or phenomena that are being described or discussed in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here's the updated list of entities that refer to Material Property:

1. "absorption"

The term "absorption broadening" is not a material property, but rather a phenomenon that occurs in materials. Therefore, it has been removed from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the table with the valid entities that refer to Material Property:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption |

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

2. 780 nm
3. 650 nm

Sure, here are the updated "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

2. 780 nm
3. 650 nm

These are the values that refer to the absorption spectrum of the polymer, specifically the range of wavelengths where strong and broad photo-induced responses were observed.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Sure, here are the valid "Property Value" entities in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| --- |

| 780 nm |

Note that I've kept the units (nm) as part of the property value, as they are an integral part of the value and provide important context.
